text: Cercinium or Kerkineion () or Kerkinion (Κερκινέον) was a town in Magnesia, in ancient Thessaly, near the Lake Boebeis. The site of Cercinium is located at a place called Ano Amygdali. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Ancient Magnesia
title: Cercinium
